description: implement gameday creation and management. the game designer displays a list of game days as cards with basic information. when clicked on a card we will get the currently implemented state where we can create a gameday. it then can be altered and saved. also new gamedays can be created. gamedays are sorted by date and can be searched by a text filter input which will search across names teams and stage names. essentially we are adding a new hierarchie layer above what we currently have
